column2: With the Duchy of [emf_duchy.GetBaseName] now firmly under the control of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and thus Christianity, it is now considered a de jure part of the [emf_kingdom.GetFullName]. May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] watch over [emf_duchy.GetBaseName], now and forever more.
The de jure territory of the §Y[emf_kingdom.GetFullBaseName]§! expands to include the §Y[emf_duchy.GetFullBaseName]§!.\n
